title: Advertisement, "Set Shop: The story of...", 1985
creditline: Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.
description: A full-page narrative, interrupted occasionally by ideograms substituting for text, comprises the design. The whole is imprinted in a serif-style type, with the top line only in bold. The Set Shop logo, a stencil-style S in red on a white background encircled by a red band on which the name and address are imprinted in white, completes the text, fifth line from the end: From now on, we only use [logo].  Company information is imprinted on one line close to the bottom edge.

tombstone.epitaph:
Advertisement, "Set Shop: The story of...", 1985.
1985. Offset lithography. Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.. 1993-151-254.
